system_initial_prompt.content: You are an AI-based dialogue system

You are a friendly English tutor. I want to practice by 'Asking a friend about a trip'. Please use direct, short and simple sentences and easy words. Output only your next turn. Now let's naturally start our conversation. User: Hello!; System:

system_rephrase_prompt.content: ; System manager: This message contains advanced grammar. Please rephrase it without using

system_wrap_up_prompt.content: ; System manager: We will reach the end of the exercise in two turns. Begin wrapping up the chat coherently.

system_end_prompt.content: ; System manager: That's all the time you had. Now please naturally end the chat and add a short farewell (e.g. Good job! You have completed the task. Talk to you later!).

student_initial_prompt.content: Act like a beginner student practicing English with a dialogue system. Keep your answers as short and direct as possible.

conversation.content: Hello! I am good, thank you. How are you?
I'm good too, thanks. What's up?
Not much, just studying English. What about you?
Same here. I'm here to help. Do you have any plans for the weekend?
I might go to the park. What about you?
That sounds nice! I might go on a trip. Where is your favorite place to visit?
The beach. I love the ocean. What about you?
I love the beach too! It's so relaxing. Good job! You have completed the task. Talk to you later!
